Containers.Name: jmgodbout-irccloud-cli
Containers.Description: irccloud-cli is a console-based client for irccloud[br][br] [b][u][span style='color: #E80000;']Configuration[/span][/u][/b][br] [b]/app[/b] This is where irccloud-cli will get it's configuration file.[br] There must be a configuration file there named 'config.json' ``` { "host": "https://www.irccloud.com", "email": "jmgodbout@gmail.com", "password": "cu7tdSRzW_VMSNH5pSNBwxpgxUiKt75nRsa-grUU" } ```
Containers.Overview: irccloud-cli is a console-based client for irccloud.
